definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
Croceine croaker (Pseudosciaena crocea), a fish popular in Cantonese cooking
(bird species of China) greater yellownape (Chrysophlegma flavinucha)
pinyin: da4 huang2 guan1 zhuo2 mu4 niao3

sentences.english: And all bumblebees have tiny wings, relative to their body size.
sentences.chinese: 而所有的大黄蜂都只有相对其体形而言很小的翅膀。

sentences.english: It is real man, Optimus Prime and Bumblebee.
sentences.chinese: 擎天柱和大黄蜂是真男人。

sentences.english: The distribution and expansion of Rumex nepalensis was affected by local traditional grazing regimes.
sentences.chinese: 土大黄的分布和扩张与传统的轮牧体系息息相关。

sentences.english: Does this mean Fido is into dominance and submission?
sentences.chinese: 这就意味着大黄所作所为是统治与服从的表现么？

sentences.english: The yellow dog at home is coming up and gaily around three people jump.
sentences.chinese: 家中的大黄迎上来，欢快地绕着仨人跳跃。

sentences.english: The results indicate that Rhubarb inhibit nervous lesion and cerebral edema in rats.
sentences.chinese: 表明生大黄可改善脑出血大鼠的神经损害。

sentences.english: Objective To seek a novel extraction method for anthraquinone from rhubarb with- out destroying the major active components of anthraquinone.
sentences.chinese: 目的寻找不易破坏大黄主要有效成分的提取方法。

sentences.english: Objective To develop a method for determining contents of emodin and chrysophanol in Yiqing granules.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立一清颗粒中大黄素与大黄酚含量测定的方法。

sentences.english: Sipsmith Gin, Rhubarb and Rosehip Cordial, Lemon Juice, Vanilla Syrup.
sentences.chinese: 史密斯杜松子酒，大黄和玫瑰甜果汁，柠檬汁，香草。

sentences.english: The contents of emodin and chrysophanol were determined by HPLC.
sentences.chinese: 运用高效液相色谱法测定大黄素和大黄酚的含量。

sentences.english: "Rhubarb" garrulous living man's clothes, how to say either you just do not spread.
sentences.chinese: “大黄”叨住那人的衣服，任你怎么说就是不撒。

sentences.english: The content of rhein could be determined by HPLC.
sentences.chinese: HPLC法可测定出大黄酸的含量。

sentences.english: Make an infusion by boiling and simmering the rhubarb and camomile together.
sentences.chinese: 将大黄和甘菊一起煮沸再用文火炖，熬成汤药。

sentences.english: You’d wear daisies in your hair and I’d chase away the hornets.
sentences.chinese: 你在头上插满雏菊，我赶走大黄蜂。

sentences.english: A single hornet can kill 40 bees in a minute.
sentences.chinese: 一只大黄蜂在一分钟之内就能害死40只蜜蜂。

sentences.english: Make an infusion by boiling and simmering the rhubarb and camomile together…
sentences.chinese: 将大黄和甘菊一起煮沸再用文火炖，熬成汤药。

definition: croton (Croton tiglium), evergreen bush of Euphorbiaceae family 大戟科[da4 ji3 ke1]/croton seed, a strong purgative
Chinese thorowax (Bupleurum chinense)/root of Chinese thorowax (used in TCM)
root of herbaceous peony (Paeonia lactiflora), used in TCM
dried fruit of immature citron or trifoliate orange (used in TCM)
the rhizome of large-headed atractylodes (Atractylodes macrocephaia)
black atractylodes rhizome (dried rhizome of any of several atractylodes species) (TCM)
Chinese foxglove (Rehmannia glutinosa), its rhizome used in TCM
variant of 黃檗|黄檗[huang2 bo4]
